title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.160 - Insect and rodent control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-4.160 - Insect and rodent control

State Regulations

The interior of pushcarts and mobile food service establishments are to be free of insects, rodents, harborage, and insect or rodent breeding conditions. Openings to the outside are to be protected against the entrance of insects and rodents. Pesticides are not to be used in place of or as a substitute for proper sanitation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-4.160

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
